page.title: 03THE HARBOUR MASTER PAGE 3
page.content: RONAN FITZSIMONS IS THE HARBOUR MASTER OF ARDGLASS HARBOUR.HIS JOB IS TO LOOK AFTER THE HARBOUR.HE MAKES SURE THERE ARE NO HOLES IN THE WALL.IF THERE ARE HE GETS SOME MEN TO FILL THEM WITH CONCRETE.HE HAS A RADIO SO HE CAN HEAR IF ANY BOATS ARE IN DISTRESS AND HE CAN GET HELP.HE ALSO MAKES ICE WITH THE HELP OF BIG MACHINES THAT TAKE IN WATER,FREEZE IT AND OUT COMES ICE FROM TUBES AT THE OTHER END.HE SELLS ICE FOR Â£16 A TONNE.THERE IS ONE BIG MACHINE AND TWO SMALL ONES.TOGETHER THEY MAKE 20 TONNES OF ICE A DAY. MR.FITZSIMONS ALSO LOOKS AFTER TWO LITTLE CRANES THAT HAUL UP THE FISHBOXES THE BOATS BRING IN.MR. FITZSIMONS HAS A VERY BUSY JOB.
